post:
[![](http://smibahosting.nl/en/images/logo.png)](https://www.smibahosting.nl/)

Our site is targeting the Dutch market, it might not be fully english translated. WHMCS Can be set to English and so can SolusVM.

Our servers are hosted in The Netherlands, Steenbergen. Nedzone datacenter.

We got our [new server](http://screenshots.bartstuff.eu/NewServer_18A95F4F.png) with 4 1TB WD RE4 disks and a nice and fast Xeon E5-2620 v2. To celebrate we're making an amazing -30% offer! 
1GB usually costs €7.50 ($10.2) but this time only $7 (€5.13), get them while in stock.

1GB - €5.13 ($7) [Order (NL)](https://www.smibahosting.nl/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=27&language=Dutch&promocode=LETOFFER) - [Order (EN)](https://www.smibahosting.nl/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=27&language=English&promocode=LETOFFER) (Use Discount code "LETOFFER")
> 1GB / 30GB / 200GB BW / 100Mbit / 2 CPU Threads

512MB - €4.25 ($5.80) [Order (NL)](https://www.smibahosting.nl/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=26&language=Dutch&promocode=LET15) - [Order (EN)](https://www.smibahosting.nl/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=26&language=English&promocode=LET15) (Use Discount code "LET15")
> 512MB / 15GB / 100GB BW / 100Mbit / 1 CPU Thread

For all the other VPS'es you can get a 15% off with the Discount code "LET15". All the discounts codes count for lifetime.

To test the server ping use "vps.smibahosting.nl"
